definitions: The action of firing a projectile from a weapon.
The action of filming or photographing something.
The action of moving rapidly and suddenly in a particular direction.
The action of scoring a goal or points in a sport.
The action of sending out new growth, as a plant.
examples: The police are investigating the shooting.
We are shooting a new movie next month.
He came shooting out of the door.
She is shooting hoops with her friends.
The plant is shooting new leaves.
